00012 GLuint CreateShaderOfType(GLenum type, const char *shader_src) {
00013   GLuint shader;
00014   GLint compiled;
00015 
00016   // Create the shader object
00017   shader = glCreateShader(type);
00018 
00019   if (shader == 0)
00020     return 0;
00021 
00022   // Load and compile the shader source
00023   glShaderSource(shader, 1, &shader_src, NULL);
00024   glCompileShader(shader);
00025 
00026   // Check the compile status
00027   glGetShaderiv(shader, GL_COMPILE_STATUS, &compiled);
00028   if (compiled == 0) {
00029     GLint info_len = 0;
00030     glGetShaderiv(shader, GL_INFO_LOG_LENGTH, &info_len);
00031     if (info_len > 1) {
00032       char* info_log = reinterpret_cast<char*>(malloc(sizeof(char) * info_len));
00033       glGetShaderInfoLog(shader, info_len, NULL, info_log);
00034       // TODO(dspringer): We could really use a logging API.
00035       printf("Error compiling shader:\n%s\n", info_log);
00036       free(info_log);
00037     }
00038     glDeleteShader(shader);
00039     return 0;
00040   }
00041 
00042   return shader;
00043 }

00045 GLuint CreateProgramFromVertexAndFragmentShaders(
00046     const char *vertex_shader_src, const char *fragment_shader_src) {
00047   GLuint vertex_shader;
00048   GLuint fragment_shader;
00049   GLuint program_object;
00050   GLint linked;
00051 
00052   // Load the vertex/fragment shaders
00053   vertex_shader = CreateShaderOfType(GL_VERTEX_SHADER, vertex_shader_src);
00054   if (vertex_shader == 0)
00055     return 0;
00056   fragment_shader = CreateShaderOfType(GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER, fragment_shader_src);
00057   if (fragment_shader == 0) {
00058     glDeleteShader( vertex_shader );
00059     return 0;
00060   }
00061 
00062   // Create the program object and attach the shaders.
00063   program_object = glCreateProgram();
00064   if (program_object == 0)
00065     return 0;
00066   glAttachShader(program_object, vertex_shader);
00067   glAttachShader(program_object, fragment_shader);
00068 
00069   // Link the program
00070   glLinkProgram(program_object);
00071 
00072   // Check the link status
00073   glGetProgramiv(program_object, GL_LINK_STATUS, &linked);
00074   if (linked == 0) {
00075     GLint info_len = 0;
00076     glGetProgramiv(program_object, GL_INFO_LOG_LENGTH, &info_len);
00077     if (info_len > 1) {
00078       char* info_log = reinterpret_cast<char*>(malloc(sizeof(char) * info_len));
00079       glGetProgramInfoLog(program_object, info_len, NULL, info_log);
00080       // TODO(dspringer): We could really use a logging API.
00081       printf("Error linking program:\n%s\n", info_log);
00082       free(info_log);
00083     }
00084     glDeleteProgram(program_object);
00085     return 0;
00086   }
00087 
00088   // Delete these here because they are attached to the program object.
00089   glDeleteShader(vertex_shader);
00090   glDeleteShader(fragment_shader);
00091 
00092   return program_object;
00093 }
